full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNGA MONG GI GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES RNGA MONG GI GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DA LTAR SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU RNAM PAR DKAR BA'I BSAGS PA'I GANG ZAG NYIN MO'I SKAR MA BZHIN 'GA' ZHIG YOD KYANG PHYVA BZHI LONGS SPYOD NA'ANG STONG STONG MED MED PA ZHES PA'I DBANG GIS RKYEN GYIS MA BYAS KYANG MANG PAS, NOR LHA RNAMS LAS GANG 'DOD PA'I DNGOS GRUB ZHUS PA GA-YANG 'GUGS KYI RIM PA DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS MDZAD PA MANG DU YOD KYANG, RNGA MONG GI GA-YANG SKYABS BLA MA RNAL 'BYOR PA ZHES BYA BA 'DI MDZAD PA SOG SKAD MDOR BSDUS PA ZHIG LAS MED PAS, BLA MA DE NI GRUB PA THOB PA ZHIG YIN PAS SNGON NAS SHIS PA BYUNG BA'I GSUNG YIN PA'I PHYIR DE LA THAB LHA BSKYED PA DANG MCHOD PA BSANGS GA-YANG 'GUGS SOGS KYIS KHA BSKANGS TE THUN MONGS MA YIN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA CAN RNAMS LA DGOS PA MED NA'ANG, 'JIG RTEN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA BDAG 'DRA BA RES 'GA' LA PHAN SNYAM DKAR BA'I SEMS KYIS BSKUL TE DGE SLONG GZUGS 'DZIN AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
